description: [Status: stable] [Name: ambiguous-class-name] [Message: Ambiguous class name: {name}] What it does Checks for the use of the characters 'l', 'O', or 'I' as class names. Why is this bad? In some fonts, these characters are indistinguishable from the numerals one and zero. When tempted to use 'l', use 'L' instead. Example class I(object): ... Use instead: class Integer(object): ...
